channel.title: Hand Cannon Problems
channel.description:
Well.. I Was Searching On Google Hand Cannon Ints, Models..
And I Found Out "Cocoa's Guide" And I Test It,It Work Really Well..
But I Have Some Small Errors.. (Need Help)
First: He Said To Put That Code In The Class 20:
[code]if (j==1133) //Cannon { aClass20Array351[j].anInt352 = 2; //number of frames aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray353 = new int[2]; aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray354 = new int[2]; aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray355 = new int[2]; } aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray353[0] = 8447; aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray354[0] = -1; aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray355[0] = 0; { aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray353[1] = 8448; aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray354[1] = -1; aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray355[1] = 0; {[/code]
But He Didn't Said Where I Gotta Put It In the class 20
So I Put It At The End Of The Class 20.. And I Get These Errors (25 Errors)
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/5ev475.jpg[/img]
And The 2nd Problem Is:
I Don't Know How To Make My Hand Cannon A Range Wepon.. So Its A Melee Wepon Atm -.-..
And Also I Wonder How To Put Hand Cannon Shots,Balls So When You Wear Them With The Hand Cannon You Lose Them.. Well I Don't Know How To Make Them Fit With The Cannon o-O..
Please Help! D:

item.title: Hand Cannon Problems
item.dc:creator: @Funny_Man Funny Man
item.description:
@Funny_Man wrote:

Edit: I’ve Been Working On This For Hours… And I Finally Got Only “2 Errors”

-Please Tell Me Whats Wrong-!

This Is My Class 20 Looking:

if (j==1133);//Cannon { aClass20Array351[j].anInt352 = 2;//number of frames } aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray353 = new int[2]; { aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray354 = new int[2]; } aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray355 = new int[2]; { aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray353[0] = 8447; } aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray354[0] = -1; { aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray355[0] = 0; } aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray353[1] = 8448; { aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray354[1] = -1; } aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray355[1] = 0; { } {

And This Is The 2 Errors

Read full topic

item.title: Hand Cannon Problems
item.dc:creator: @conner1 conner_
item.description:
@conner1 wrote:

Move the middle bracket to the line after aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray355[1] = 0;

Read full topic

item.title: Hand Cannon Problems
item.dc:creator: @Funny_Man Funny Man
item.description:
@Funny_Man wrote:

Could You Tell Me Where The Brackets Are Missing On This? :s

Cus I Test Everything And Still Getting The Same Errors

} if (j==1133) //Cannon { aClass20Array351[j].anInt352 = 2; //number of frames aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray353 = new int[2]; aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray354 = new int[2]; aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray355 = new int[2]; } aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray353[0] = 8447; aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray354[0] = -1; aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray355[0] = 0; { aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray353[1] = 8448; aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray354[1] = -1; aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray355[1] = 0; }

-Ty Already.

Peace Out!

Read full topic

item.title: Hand Cannon Problems
item.dc:creator: @conner1 conner_
item.description:
@conner1 wrote:

Regarding the first question, check your {, }, ( and ), you are probably missing one of them somewhere and it is messing up everything after. Look just before line 3091. It is probably somewhere between lines 3080 and 3090 that you are missing a bracket.

Read full topic
